mapper.sql: id, name, created_user AS createdUser, stu_no AS stuNo, exam_no AS examNo, card_no AS cardNo, major, sex, school, rank, stu_num AS stuNum, stu_type AS stuType, score, precedence, policy, limit_content AS limitContent, other, chinese, english, manth, physics, chemistry, biology, comprehensive, created_time AS createdTime

mapper.select: SELECT FROM student WHERE stu_no = #{stuNo} ORDER BY id desc
